verses.verse: To the chief Musician<WH5329> upon<WH5921> Mahalath,<WH4257> Maschil,<WH4905> A Psalm of David.<WH1732> The fool<WH5036> hath said<WH559> in his heart,<WH3820> There is no<WH369> God.<WH430> Corrupt<WH7843> are they, and have done abominable<WH8581> iniquity:<WH5766> there is none<WH369> that doeth<WH6213> good.<WH2896>

God <WH430> looked down<WH8259> from heaven<WH4480> <WH8064> upon<WH5921> the children<WH1121> of men,<WH120> to see<WH7200> if there were<WH3426> any that did understand,<WH7919> that did seek<WH1875> <WH853> God.<WH430>
Every one<WH3605> of them is gone back:<WH5472> they are altogether<WH3162> become filthy;<WH444> there is none<WH369> that doeth<WH6213> good,<WH2896> no,<WH369> not<WH1571> one.<WH259>
Have the workers<WH6466> of iniquity<WH205> no<WH3808> knowledge?<WH3045> who eat up<WH398> my people<WH5971> as they eat<WH398> bread:<WH3899> they have not<WH3808> called upon<WH7121> God.<WH430>

There <WH8033> were they in great fear,<WH6342> <WH6343> where no<WH3808> fear<WH6343> was:<WH1961> for<WH3588> God<WH430> hath scattered<WH6340> the bones<WH6106> of him that encampeth<WH2583> against thee: thou hast put them to shame,<WH954> because<WH3588> God<WH430> hath despised<WH3988> them.

Oh that<WH4310> <WH5414> the salvation<WH3444> of Israel<WH3478> were come out of Zion!<WH4480> <WH6726> When God<WH430> bringeth back<WH7725> the captivity<WH7622> of his people,<WH5971> Jacob<WH3290> shall rejoice,<WH1523> and Israel<WH3478> shall be glad.<WH8055>
